title: Why were Swain, Irelia, Akali, and Nunu prioritized over Mordekaiser?
body: I'm pretty sure that Morde's bugs haven't been fixed because yet he's supposed to receive a VGU sometime soon, but if that's the case, why were the aforementioned champions prioritized for a rework over him? Besides Akali, their gameplay wasn't/isn't really too toxic.

replies.body: There are factors that influence what champions are being considered for VGUs or GUs - Mordekaiser is indeed up for a VGU officially. Then there are factors that determine what champions are actually worked on. One of them is: Having an idea what to do. The reason why Mordekaiser isn't reworked again yet is that Riot doesn't know what to do with him - yet.
name checks out

then there's people like this guy who still believes RIOT GAMES
LMAOO

As many others will say, it's not just about which champion needs a rework the most. It's also about how clear a direction the rework teams have, regarding any single champion. 
None argues that champs like morde (or nunu for that matter) are in dire need of a VGU, for an awful lot of reasons. Problem is, with Morde in particular RIto has so far struggled to find a solid concept for him. 
Considering how good the reworks are so far, I'd say that it says a lot about Mordekaiser's situation. 
I mean, champs like warwick, irelia, swain, galio, weren't really standing out in terms of identity. Still, the teams managed to find key elements these champs already had, and improved upon them to develop solid reworks. 

WIth Mordekaiser apparently it's far more difficult, as the teams can't really decide what to keep about him and what to take away. 
At least that's what many Rioters already said in the last couple years.

Riot also has to pick a direction they care about.
AND they need to care more about that then the other ideas for other champs floating around.

Those don't include lore, character, or art ideas that Riot can use. Malicious Metal may talk about how Morde should be an OP conquerer for character and draw his Sauron pen sketches, but that isn't something Riot can use for a solid direction. 

Most of the Morde concepts are mostly just Sauron copy posts. Riot wants Mordekaiser to be more than just Sauron in League.

Say what you want about Swain, Irelia and Akali. But Nunu? Come on, man. Nunu deals less damage than a juggernaut, has no ally defense techniques to be a warden, has no gap closer to be a diver or a vanguard, and has no hard CC to fit either the warden or vanguard archetype. Nunu's kit is just out of date. He doesn't function as any of the proper roles in the game, the closest he has is 'fighter', like a generic fighter with no direct class. That's pitiful.

I don't even know what Nunu is classified as anymore. Can't say he's a Guardian since he lacks reliable peel & can't say he's a Vanguard as he's not someone who can start teamfights. 

I guess the closest thing he resembles would be a juggernaut, with his tankiness & his damage (assuming he can get good ultimates off). Even then, I'm still not sure...
Exactly. He needs a rework, much more than Mordekaiser does.

He needed to be addressed at the time.  They even did  a good job of retooling his kit Back to solo lane but that didn't stop his winrate from hovering at 46% for 2 years.

Honestly I think that when Mordekaiser is going to receive his VGU (when ever it is), it's going to be completely different. In terms of him potentially being a complete different character than what we know as now. His kit, theme and him supposedly being a Juggernaut just didn't turn out to work well.

I know that Riot usually keeps one or two elements of reworked champions to make it feel still somewhat familiar but i'm not sure that this is going to be a case.

I mean take Aatrox for example, REAV3 confirmed on Beyond the Rift that Aatrox was going to be the "biggest pure gameplay update we have ever done" and that all of his "abilities are different, 100%". He continued to say that Aatrox was potentially going to be a Juggernaut, so I see Mordekaiser receiving the same level of gameplay update as Aatrox.
